channel.title: Humanitarian Data Science
channel.description: Recent content on Humanitarian Data Science

item.title: Accessing data from REST API using R: examples for KoBoToolbox and Country Based Pooled Fund (CBPF) data
item.description: R program has become a language of choice for data science work. It has rich feature library that can be readily used for variety of data management tasks. This article focuses on accessing data from the KoBoToolbox. KoBoToolbox KoBoToolbox provides a suite of tools for field data collection in the challenging environments. It is free and open source and works both on and offline. KoBoToolbox has a number of advanced features which are very useful for advanced use case scenario.

item.title: About
item.description: A blog to showcase the use of advanced techniques for humanitarian data science. Thanks for reading!
